name: RandomBeerStyle
0: ”Alexa, open random beer style and give me a style”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random beer style
des: Created by the Jersey City Brew Club for selecting a random style in our competitions, we want to share this with the larger home brewing community. This skill will return the ID and name of a random beer style in accordance with the BJCP 2015 guidelines. This is useful for helping beer clubs determine a style for competitions, to inspire a home brewer for what to brew next, or just a fun way to learn about beer styles.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
